properties.title: Vallorbe caverns
properties.abstract: The galleries carved out of the limestone in the Vallorbe Caves stretch over 3 km. The Fairy Treasure Trove, a collection of 250 minerals, enchants visitors.
properties.description: The source of the river Orbe: natureâ€™s hidden splendours revealed. Since 1974, hundreds of thousands of visitors, both children and adults, have been astounded by the magic of the stalagmites, the stalactites, the draperies and the columns forming a breathtaking decor. After your visit, don't miss a unique exhibition of minerals displayed in a fairy-tale decor.
properties.name: Grottes de Vallorbe
